Plot: Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé.
Title: Baggage Claim
Writer: David E. Talbert (screenplay), David E. Talbert (based on the novel entitled "Baggage Claim" by)
Actors: Paula Patton, Derek Luke, Taye Diggs, Boris Kodjoe
tomatoConsensus: Baggage Claim hits the same notes as a number of successful romantic comedies without establishing much personality of its own.
